column2: I think that being able to see into the kitchen through the large windows is awesome. Maybe not for the people trying to actually work
column4: it was a nice design. This place has a great vibe that makes me think of an old diner that got turned upscale. It has booths and tables
column5: and the completed orders are delivered through a long open window that is in view from the seating area just like you would expect from a little southern diner
column6: but it is decorated very modern and a lot of thought obviously went into the design.
